PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-06542005-04-21,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of JOHANNE BRUNET of Montréal, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, in the place of Marie Giguère, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
